  • public class Validate
extends java.lang.Object

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 静态方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void continentChecks()
      This method is used to check if the number of countries in continents is equal to the maximum number that is set to the continent
      static Validate getValidate()
      This method is used to get the validation of connected countries
      int getValidateSize()
      This method is used to get the size of the validation list
      void mapConnected(Country origin)
      Given a Country, this method recursively goes through this country's neighbours and adds then to countriesModelValidationList If (countriesModelValidationList.size() == map.getCountries().size()) then from a given country, we can travel to all other countries, so map is connected
      void validateMap()
      This method is used to validate the map by connecting country with its neighbours

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Validate

        public Validate()

    • 方法详细资料

      • getValidateSize

        public int getValidateSize()
        This method is used to get the size of the validation list
        返回:
        return the size of validation list of countries model

      • continentChecks

        public void continentChecks()
                     throws CannotFindException,
                            CountLimitException
        This method is used to check if the number of countries in continents is equal to the maximum number that is set to the continent
        抛出:
        CannotFindException - Exception thrown when file formatting is
        CountLimitException - Exception thrown when number of country in a continent is different from fixed number.

      • mapConnected

        public void mapConnected(Country origin)
        Given a Country, this method recursively goes through this country's neighbours and adds then to countriesModelValidationList If (countriesModelValidationList.size() == map.getCountries().size()) then from a given country, we can travel to all other countries, so map is connected
        参数:
        origin - The origin country whose neighbours will be added to countriesModelValidationList

      • validateMap

        public void validateMap()
                 throws CannotFindException,
                        CountLimitException
        This method is used to validate the map by connecting country with its neighbours
        抛出:
        CannotFindException - Exception thrown when file formatting is
        CountLimitException - Exception thrown when number of country in a continent is different from fixed number.

      • getValidate

        public static Validate getValidate()
        This method is used to get the validation of connected countries
        返回:
        validate The validation of connected map
